name: Rescue helicopter game
description:
Our old project we working on it in early 2010. The project was developed on Macromedia Director for our site. After a while, browser games were under attack Apple and Google. And Macromedia shockwave plugin (that need to playing this in browsers) was killed first. We lost any motivation and work was stopped. Today for memories of helicopter, here (on itch.io) we need only host this project. Game not completely made and not so interesting. Today graphics looks so ugly. LoL )))

Here you can find some kind of help, some information about Rescue Helicopter Game Engine
